topic.title: Register and Profile
topic.section: The journal uses a registration system for all users who are part of the editorial and publishing process, as well as Readers who wish to be notified of new issues, and who wish to be counted, in support of the journal's efforts. The registration is government by the journal's Privacy Policy. Each registered user has a Profile which can be edited or added to by the user on logging into the journal Web site. The link for the Profile is found in the right-hand margin, under User.
